xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 11 Upādānagocchaka » 11.5 Upādānaupādānasampayuttaduka » 11.5.7 Pañhāvāra » 11.5.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 11.5.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Kammādi
Upādānagocchaka
Upādānaupādānasampayuttaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Kammādi
110.
3792Upādānasampayutto ceva no ca upādāno dhammo upādānasampayuttassa ceva no ca upādānassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi…  āhārapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi…  indriyapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi…  jhānapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi…  maggapaccayena paccayo…  nava…  sampayuttapaccayena paccayo…  nava…  atthipaccayena paccayo…  nava…  natthipaccayena paccayo…  nava…  vigatapaccayena paccayo…  nava…  avigatapaccayena paccayo…  nava.
<< Upanissayaup11.5.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra >>
